## initSelection variable

Initialize the selection based on the passed in tagged node via it's cursor.

The supported tags are `['cursor', 'node', 'start', 'end', 'anchor', 'all']`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
initSelection: <GSchema extends Schema<string, string> = any>(taggedDoc: pm.TaggedProsemirrorNode<GSchema>) => GapCursor | Selection<GSchema> | null
```
